result.purpose: This folder contains templates for reporting bugs and requesting features in a GitHub repository.
result.architecture: The folder follows a simple configuration pattern, utilizing YAML files to define templates for issues, which are structured to facilitate user input.

.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug-report.yaml.purpose: Template for reporting bugs in a project
side_effects: Encourages users to report security issues privately
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive information if issues are reported publicly

.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/config.yml.purpose: Configuration file for GitHub issue templates

.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature-request.y.purpose: Defines a template for feature requests in a GitHub repository.
